column5: Aquitaine is paneled in red cedar, giving it a rich, warm elegance. It is located upstairs in the Great Hall of Sherwood Castle. This room has a queen sized bed with matching dresser, and is individually climate-controlled. The semi-private bathroom with claw-footed tub is shared between Aquitaine and Normandy.  Castle guests receive free admission to the Faire and Celtic Festival if they occur during their stay.  View all our rooms: https://www.airbnb.com/s?host_id=14519831
